Doctoral Colloquium B (RELN9001)

Course level

Postgraduate Research

Faculty

Humanities and Social Sciences

School

Historical & Philosophical Inq

Units

2

Duration

One Semester

Class contact

20 hours over 4 days

Assessment methods

Two essays

Course coordinator

Dr N Pembroke

Current course offerings

Course offerings Location Mode Course Profile
Summer Semester, 2018 St Lucia Internal Profile unavailable

Please Note: Course profiles marked as not available may still be in development.

Course description

NOT 2011 This colloquium has the twofold purpose of: (1) Introducing candidates to leading models of theological reflection; & (2) Offering a forum in which candidates can receive support & critique in relation to their thesis work.
